results.title: [Anatomy of the hand] (D)
results.brief_description: Dissection of a human hand and arm showing the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of the hand and its individual fingers. Presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
results.description: Dissection of a human hand and arm showing the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of the hand and its individual fingers. Presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.

results.title: [Air parade]
results.brief_description: Set behind-the-scenes of an American radio station in the 1940’s, this B-Grade melodrama revolves around the escapades of a scheming studio head and a troupe of radio performers aspiring towards stardom and success. The players include, Niela Goodelle, Lee Sullivan, Arthur Boran, Russ Brown, Clyde Fillmore, Edith Gresham, Marion Martin and Johnny Johnson’s Orchestra which is a typical dance band of the era.
